> ⚠️ **For sensitive security issues**, please email the maintainer directly instead of creating a public issue.

## Description
Describe the security or privacy concern.

## Severity
- [ ] Critical (data breach, remote code execution)
- [ ] High (privilege escalation, data exposure)
- [ ] Medium (denial of service, information disclosure)
- [ ] Low (minor security improvement)

## Steps to Reproduce
If applicable, how can this be reproduced?

## Potential Impact
What could an attacker do with this vulnerability?

## Suggested Fix
If you have ideas on how to fix this, please share.

## Additional Context
Any other relevant information.
